text: hen Chloe Fu , 24 , went for a run on Monday evening , the streets of Stockholm were filled with NNS drinking on restaurant patios , enjoying the JJ warm day of sunshine after a JJ winter . “ When you walk around , there is a total and utter absence of panic , ” Fu VBZ , who moved to Sweden from the NNP NNPS last NN . “ The streets are just as busy as they MD have been last spring . ” As JJ public spaces throughout Europe empty out — with citizens only leaving home for essential groceries or medication — NN in Sweden is carrying on , mostly as usual . NNS walk to school while adults meet up for dinner at their local bar . Only the vulnerable have been advised to isolate and some are working from home . Yet in Sweden , where there are 9,141 confirmed NNS and 793 NNS have died , experts worry weaker measures MD be leading to a more severe outbreak in the country of just 10 million citizens . Sweden has a relatively high case fatality rate : as of April 8 , 7.68 % of the Swedes who have tested positive for NNP - CD have died of the NN . Neighboring NNS , IN Norway and Denmark , have case fatality rates of 1.46 % and 3.85 % respectively . ( The U.S. case fatality rate is 3.21 % . ) While Sweden ’s elevated case fatality rate MD be a result of its low testing rates compared to its neighbors , experts say Sweden ’s laissez - faire approach MD RB be to blame . The Swedish NN continues to advocate for relaxed measures . The Swedish Public NNP Agency cautions citizens to cover their mouths when they cough or sneeze and wash hands regularly but does not call for lockdown measures . On March 11 , the NN cut down the size of permitted gatherings to 500 , and only lowered that down to 50 on March 29 . Other NNS , IN Germany and Australia , have prohibited gathering in groups larger than CD . On Monday , Sweden declared that domestic flights MD continue running , despite the risks domestic travel poses for spreading the NN . Anders Tegnell , Sweden ’s chief epidemiologist overseeing the NN ’s response to NNP - CD has VBN the NN should allow the NN to spread slowly through the population , an approach initially employed by the NNP Kingdom and the Netherlands before both NNS rapidly changed strategy amid mounting evidence that this approach MD still overburden NN care systems . Tegnell VBD Swedish TV on April 5 that NNP - CD MD be stopped by “ herd immunity or a combination of immunity and NN . ” ( A NN for NNP - CD is likely at least 14 months away . ) But JJ experts throughout Sweden say the current strategy is dangerous . “ Herd immunity does n’t make sense because we do n’t VB whether or not you can become immune , ” VBZ Nele Brusselaers , an associate professor of clinical epidemiology . She added , “ this is a NN that can kill anybody . ” Keep up to date with our daily NN newsletter by clicking here . At the end of March , 2,300 doctors , NNS and academics signed an open letter to the NN calling for stricter measures . “ We VBP there is no scientific evidence for their strategy , ” VBZ Cecilia Söderberg - Nauclér , an expert in microbial pathogenesis who signed the letter . She VBZ the NN has been reluctant to share its data with NNS , leading her to VB that the NN ’s strategy is “ not based on evidence . ” Carina King , an infectious diseases epidemiologist , agrees that the NN ’s lack of transparency makes it “ really hard to give proper scientific thoughts on their approach because they have n’t released their NN . ” She added that the NN has made no concrete efforts to test , contact trace and quarantine — as South Korea did — which is standard protocol to stop localized spread at the beginning of an outbreak . Nevertheless , she VBZ Sweden MD be a rare case where a nationwide lockdown MD not be necessary . “ Sweden is unique , ” she VBZ . “ It does n’t have JJ intergenerational households . It is a country where you MD have a mixed approach . ” Though interpersonal distance is valued in Swedish culture and 40 % of Swedish households are single - person households without NNS , other experts say that NNP - CD can still spread rapidly and widely in these conditions . Sweden has the second lowest number of critical care beds in Europe after Portugal , with only 5 beds for every 100,000 inhabitants . The healthcare system MD likely be unable to handle a severe NN - CD outbreak . Currently , experts say the Swedish NN is not following the NNP NNP Organization ’s ( WHO ) guidelines , which advise NNS with NN - CD outbreaks to contact trace where possible and to adopt strict self - isolation measures . “ I ’m surprised and frustrated that they still have not taken any action or listened to the advice of organizations IN WHO , ” VBZ Brusselaers . “ They disregard any prediction model that has been published by experts in the field and they do n’t RB give a defense . ” A head NN at a major hospital in Sweden VBZ the current approach will “ probably end in a historical massacre . ” He VBZ healthcare workers at his hospital who have tested positive for the NN but are asymptomatic have been advised to continue working . He asked to remain anonymous because “ it is frowned upon to speak of the epidemic or to VB against the official vision ” but VBD he felt a need to speak out from an “ ethical and medical point of view . ” The Swedish legislature will meet this week to discuss whether tougher measures restricting business and travel should be implemented . Söderberg - Nauclér VBZ it ’s already too late to prevent chaos in Stockholm but that preventative lockdown measures MD still be taken throughout other parts of the country . “ If they are JJ and we are wrong , I will open a bottle of champagne , ” Söderberg - Nauclér VBZ . She notes that , based on the modeling she ’s seen , the healthcare system in Sweden will collapse if stricter measures are not adopted immediately . “ But I will not give up the fight until the NN shows us evidence for their strategy . ” While experts MD be taking issue with the NN ’s approach , JJ Swedes seem to be in favor of it . Opinion polls show that citizens trust the Public NNP Authority , with 48 % saying they have very high or high confidence in the institution . “ It ’s rare for Swedish society to loudly disapprove of the NN , ” VBZ Fu . “ RB though NNS are concerned about losing loved ones , they RB trust that the NN is doing the JJ thing . ” And Swedes have above - average confidence in their politicians , who in turn , trust citizens to follow their advice . “ In Sweden , the approach has always been to make suggestions and let the public decide , ” VBZ Johan Erik Lallerstedt , a 23 - NN - old filmmaker living in Stockholm . “ Whatever guidelines the NN MD give are just that : suggestions . Nothing is enforced . ” But Söderberg - Nauclér believes this outbreak MD bring an end to a JJ history of public trust in NN . “ If you put NNS ’s lives at NN in democratic society and then you do not VB them , how will society trust politicians ? ” she VBZ . “ I do n’t VB to live in a society that treats NNS IN this . ” Please send any tips , leads , and stories to virus@time.com .

text: China National Biotec Group ( CNBG ) has won approval to run a JJ - scale " Phase 3 " clinical trial of its novel NN NN candidate in the NNP Arab Emirates ( UAE ) , the NN VBD on Tuesday . China is seeking to trial potential NNS overseas because of a lack of JJ patients at home . Over a dozen experimental NNS are being trialled around the NN . None of them has yet successfully completed a late - stage " Phase 3 " test to determine efficacy in shielding healthy NNS from the NN , which has killed over 4,70,000 NNS around the NN . Such trials involve thousands of participants and normally take place in NNS where the NN is widespread , so that the NN can be observed in a real - NN environment . However , China , the origin of the JJ NN , reported fewer than 10 JJ local NNS a day on average last month , and its researchers are now looking abroad . CNBG announced the move in a Weibo JJ NN post , without naming the NN to be tested in the UAE . Units of CNBG , an affiliate of the NN - owned China National Pharmaceutical Group ( Sinopharm ) , have developed CD potential NNS , which have together been given to over 2,000 NNS in previous tests in China . Other Chinese NNS seeking to trial NNS overseas include Clover Biopharmaceuticals , whose shots have been given to participants in Australia in an early NN , and Sinovac Biotech , which is expected to begin a Phase 3 trial in Brazil with 9,000 volunteers .

text: Gaithersburg , Maryland - based biotech NN Novavax announced yesterday it has begun enrolling its JJ JJ participants in a Phase 1/2 clinical trial . Preliminary immunogenicity ( ability to provoke an immune response ) and safety results from the Phase 1 portion of the trial are expected in July 2020 . Novavax is hoping the proprietary nanoparticle technology and Matrix ‑M adjuvant used in its promising NN NN , NanoFlu , will VB create an effective novel NN NN . Novavax stock is up 17 % today on the NN and is up over 1000 % NN - to - date , but this is n't based on its progress alone . Remember Novavax is the same firm receiving $ 388 million in funding from the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations ( CEPI ) ﻿﻿. The Oslo - based foundation focuses on NN development and was founded by billionaire Bill Gates in 2017 . " NNS provide our best hope of permanently defeating this NN , so it is encouraging to VB rapid progress being made in the development of Novavax ’ NN candidate , " VBD Dr. Richard Hatchett , CEO of CEPI , in the press release . CEPI has given much smaller amounts ranging from $ 1 million to $ 9 million to others working on NN NNS , including Inovio , Moderna and CureVac . Today U.S. pharma giant Merck threw its hat into the ring with three initiatives to VB end the NN . It has bought Vienna - based Themis Bioscience , which is developing a NN , and collaborating with non-profit IAVI and Ridgeback Bio on a NN and antiviral candidate , respectively . As of NNP 22 , there are 10 NN - CD NN candidates in clinical evaluation and 114 candidates in preclinical evaluation , according to WHO . The 10 in the clinical evaluation stage belong to : Although we 're still months , if not NNS , from a safe NN available to the general population , the Novavax NN is contributing to the market surge today . " As is the financial market ’s VB these days though , RB the slimmest of positive NN on the NN - CD front trigger a bullish immune response and another wave of the peak - NN trade , " wrote OANDA analyst Jeffrey Halley . " That came on several fronts today . U.S. Memorial weekend saw the U.S. out in force enjoying their post lockdown freedoms . Japan in addition to announcing more billions in stimulus , signaled that the final lockdowns over their largest cities are ending . RB U.S. - China trade tensions have been pushed off the front pages , crushed beneath the tank tracks of the peak - NN trade ’s momentum . "

text: • NN scientist : You can expect to VB CD in CD NNS afflicted by 2025 . Is the NN facing an explosion in the number of NNS with NN ? A respected researcher believes it is already happening . Worse , for boys , the rate soars to CD in 42 . ” This reporter RB spoke with Wendy Fournier , NN of the National NNP Association , who clarified some of these statistics . “ The 2013 CDC NN stating that CD in every 68 NNS is diagnosed with NN was based on a NN of NNS born in the NN 2002 , ” VBD Ms. Fournier . “ Their figures are very outdated . text: As the JJ school NN has begun in Italy , parents no longer have to prove their NNS have been immunised – highlighting a clash of priorities , stoked by the JJ populist NN . In 2014 , the NNP NNP Security Agenda had tapped Italy to lead NN NN strategies . But just four NNS later , the country has instead become the testing ground for anti-vaxxers , a movement growing across Europe and the US , and whose ideologies often share NN on the political landscape with populist parties . " Ten obligatory vaccinations are useless and in JJ NNS dangerous , if not harmful , ” Italy ’s interior minister Matteo Salvini VBD , in the run up to the general election in March . The NNS epidemic in Europe as a whole is now at an eight - NN high . Mr Salvini , from the League party , and RB the country ’s deputy prime minister , shares something in common with other leading populists such as his European ally Marine Le Pen and US NN Donald NNP . As part of their anti-establishment views , they are RB choosing to target NN . The League and it ’s coalition partner , the Five Star Movement , both stood with anti-vaxxer groups during the electoral NN , promising to oppose the pre-existing law that made NNS mandatory . Soon after forming a NN , the JJ NN minister Giulia Grillo lifted the existing requirements by allowing parents to self - certify that their NNS have had the compulsory vaccinations , hitherto necessary for school admission . But the parliament then VBD the requirement to provide proof of vaccinations MD just be postponed until the 2019 - 2020 school NN . On CD side , anti-vaxxers now accuse the League and the Five Star Movement of betrayal . And on the other , confusion and legal uncertainty about compulsory NN has made the start of a JJ NN much more difficult for vulnerable NNS , such as those with suppressed immune systems . “ I ’m not ignorant , ” VBZ Anna Pettinarolli , from Genoa , the port city of northern Italy . “ I am a 35 - NN - old financial advisor who cares for her NN . I VBP that NNS can VB damage , and that ’s why I have been persuaded that parents have the NN to choose if they should vaccinate their NNS or not . ” Ms Pettinarolli is a board member of Comilva , the Italian Movement for Freedom of NNP – CD of the most well - VBN of all the Italian “ free - choice ” , or anti-vaccination associations . “ Our movement has grown over the last 30 NNS , and in particular in the last CD NNS , " she VBZ . " Do you VB to VB how JJ we are ? “ Take a look at the NN rate . Look at the percentage of unvaccinated kids , and you ’ll VB how big our numbers are . ” These numbers are exactly why the NNP NNP Organisation is so concerned about the rise of the anti-vaxxer movement in Italy ; the country ’s NN rate is far behind the goal . To stop transmission of infections , 93 - 95 per cent of the population should be immunised , the herd immunity threshold . But in 2015 , Italy ’s paediatric NNS NN rate was around 85 per cent for the JJ dose and 83 per cent for the second dose . NNS say that rather than becoming the leader in a JJ NN strategy , the country has become a black sheep . When NNS rates soared across Europe in 2017 , the number of NNS was three times higher than the NN before . The CD NNS with the highest number of NNS were Romania and Italy , with Italy accounting for 34 per cent of JJ NNS . And in a sample of 5,000 of these NNS , 89 per cent were unvaccinated NNS , according to the European Centre for NNP Prevention and NNP . In 2017 Beatrice Lorenzin , the former NN minister , reacted to the fall in vaccinations by introducing a law that obliged NNS under the age of six to undergo 10 routine NNS before enrolling in nurseries and pre-school . But this mandatory NN policy appeared to fuel the no-vaxxers protest – and populist movements capitalised on it . “ What Italy is seeing is not a vague sentiment , or parents ' response to some abstract concern about NNS . It 's the product of real NNS and specific facts , ” VBZ British journalist Brian Deer . “ This is principally the achievement of the disgraced former British NN Andrew Wakefield , and a group of enablers who work with him , aiming to destabilise public confidence in NNS . “ Embittered after he was caught falsifying NN NN , he can do this because of the opportunities provided by JJ NN . ” Mr Deer has become the unofficial debunker of the claims of anti-vaxxers . Twenty NNS ago , Wakefield published a NN in The Lancet suggesting an association between the MMR ( NNS - mumps - rubella ) NN and NN and gastrointestinal diseases . This paper is at the origins of parents ’ growing scepticism towards NN – but Mr Deer showed that Wakefield had manipulated evidence and had a conflict of interest . As The Lancet itself had to admit , the NN was “ JJ NN ” RB before the term was popular . Nevertheless , the JJ NN continues to be spread online , and public confidence in vaccinations continues to drop , and , as Mr Deer points out , the result is polarisation . text: Convincing NN skeptics to trust any future NN - CD NN is VBG to be a tough job , RB if there are mountains of data from clinical trials showing that it is safe and effective . It ’s VBG to be harder still if there is any reason for them to doubt the motives or the method behind the NN . With that in mind , I can VB CD potential trouble spots with Operation Warp Speed , NNP NNP ’s effort to leverage the full force of military , pharmaceutical industry and NN resources to develop a NN for NN - CD by the end of the NN . According to NN reports , NNP has tapped Moncef Slaoui , a former executive with giant pharmaceutical NN GlaxoSmithKline , along with a top Army general , Gustave F. Perna , to lead the effort . Slaoui clearly has the pedigree and connections for such a job . He has a doctorate in molecular biology and immunology and ran the NN development program for GlaxoSmithKline , where he worked for 30 NNS . But he ’s RB a venture capitalist who sits on a number of pharmaceutical NN boards , including those of CD NN makers , SutroVax and Moderna . Slaoui reportedly intends to step down from the boards to participate in Warp Speed , but that wo n’t erase a career spent deeply embedded in , and enriched by , the pharmaceutical industry . Putting him in charge of this effort gives ammunition to NN opponents to shoot holes in the public NN NN that will be needed to successfully immunize the public against the NN . CD of the most durable myths trafficked by so - called anti-vaxxers is that NNS are scams developed by greedy pharmaceutical NNS , abetted by a corrupt NN , to make money from substances that do more harm than good . These claims have been repeatedly debunked , and studies show that NNS are safe and effective . It ’s RB well documented that NNS have saved untold numbers of humans from suffering and death from NN . Nevertheless , the fiction spread by anti-vaxxers continues to circulate and take hold among well - meaning , if gullible , NNS . The disinformation campaigns have done real harm , too , helping drive down rates of childhood immunizations and leading to the recent resurgence of NNS in the U.S. and other NNS . And lord VB us if anything goes wrong with the NN - CD NN itself . Although NNS have been protecting NNS from deadly infectious diseases such as smallpox and influenza for centuries , they are n’t always benign and sometimes harm NNS they are intended to protect . The rush to develop a NN against polio in the 1950s had disastrous consequences . Some batches of the NN were VBN to be defective , but only after they had been rolled out in a mass immunization NN . The bad batches caused 40,000 NNS of polio , killing 10 NNS , leaving dozens more paralyzed and justifiably scaring the public about the safety of future NNS . That incident led to much tighter regulation for NNS , but it should stand as a good reminder that expediting NN development comes with risks . And the facts that the White House is calling the effort Operation Warp Speed , not Operation Save Lives , and aiming to produce 100 million doses by November suggest that the motivation is meeting an artificial deadline rather than developing a safe NN to protect the public against the NN .

text: We do n’t have enough evidence yet to VB if recovering from NN - CD induces immunity , or whether any immunity MD give RB - lasting protection against the NN SAY you have caught NN - CD and recovered – are you now immune for NN , or MD you catch it again ? We just do n’t VB yet . In February , reports emerged of a woman in Japan who had been given the all - clear after having NN - CD but then tested positive for the NNP - CoV - 2 NN a second NN . There have RB been reports of a NN in Japan testing positive after being given the all - clear , and anecdotal NNS of second positives have emerged from China , too . This has raised fears that NNS MD not develop immunity to the NN . This MD mean that , until we have an effective NN , we MD all experience repeated rounds of infection . But the NN is still uncertain . “ There is some anecdotal evidence of reinfections , but we really do n’t VB , ” VBZ Ira Longini at the NNP of Florida . It MD be that the tests used were unreliable , which is a problem with tests for other respiratory viruses , VBZ Jeffrey Shaman at Columbia NNP in NNP York . Early signs from small animal experiments are reassuring . A team from the Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences in Beijing exposed four rhesus macaques to the NN . A week later , all four were ill with NN - CD - JJ NNS and had high NN loads . CD weeks later , the macaques had recovered and were confirmed to have antibodies to the NN in their bloodstream . “ You can be infected with other coronaviruses over and over . We do n’t VB if that ’s true for this NN ” The researchers then tried to reinfect CD of them but failed , which suggests the animals were immune ( bioRxiv , doi.org/ggn8r8 ) . “ That finding is very encouraging , as it suggests that it is possible to induce protective immunity against the NN , ” VBZ Alfredo Garzino - Demo at the NNP of Maryland School of Medicine . But that does n’t necessarily mean JJ - term immunity . There are other coronaviruses circulating among humans and although they induce immunity , this does n’t last . “ Some other viruses in the NN family , such as those that VBP common colds , tend to induce immunity that is relatively short - lived , at around three months , ” VBZ Peter Openshaw at Imperial College London . “ Because [ the NN ] is so JJ , we do not yet VB how RB any protection generated through infection will last . We urgently need more NN looking at the immune responses of NNS who have recovered from infection to be sure , ” VBZ Openshaw . Other immunologists agree . “ Immunity to NN - CoV - 2 is not yet well understood and we do not VB how protective the antibody response will be in the JJ - term , ” VBZ Erica Bickerton at the Pirbright Institute in the UK . “ For ordinary NN infections , you do not VB lasting immunity , ” VBZ Longini . “ You can be infected over and over , and we really do n’t VB for this novel NN if that ’s RB true . ” Other infectious NN specialists are more optimistic . “ The evidence is increasingly convincing that infection with NNP - CoV - 2 leads to an antibody response that is protective . Most likely this protection is for NN , ” VBZ Martin Hibberd at the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine . “ Although we need more evidence to be sure of this , NNS who have recovered are unlikely to be infected with NN - CoV - 2 again . ” NN Check newsletter VB the latest NN NN in your inbox every week newscientist.com / healthcheck

text: Richard Bright , former director of the Biomedical Advanced NNP and Development Authority , arrives for a House NNP and Commerce Subcommittee on NNP hearing to discuss protecting scientific integrity in response to the NN outbreak , Thursday , NNP 14 , 2020 on Capitol Hill in Washington . ( Greg Nash / Pool via AP ) Richard Bright , former director of the Biomedical Advanced NNP and Development Authority , arrives for a House NNP and Commerce Subcommittee on NNP hearing to discuss protecting scientific integrity in response to the NN outbreak , Thursday , NNP 14 , 2020 on Capitol Hill in Washington . ( Greg Nash / Pool via AP ) WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Despite White House claims , the U.S. still lacks a comprehensive battle plan against the NN in critical areas including masks , testing , treatments and NNS , whistleblower Rick Bright warned Thursday in testimony before a House committee . “ Our window of opportunity is closing , ” he declared . The nation MD face “ the darkest winter in modern history ” if the NN rebounds , the NN NN scientist VBD lawmakers . Bright ’s appearance came after his ouster last month as head of a NNP and NNP Services biodefense agency , an action he alleges was retaliation by the NNP administration . “ We need still a comprehensive plan , and everyone across the NN and everyone in America needs to VB what that plan is , and what role they play , ” he VBD the House NNP and Commerce Committee . “ There are critical steps that we need to do to prepare ... we do not still have enough personal protective equipment to manage our NN care workers ... we still do not have the supply chains ramped up for the drugs and NNS , and we still do n’t have plans in place for how we distribute those drugs and NNS . We still do not have a comprehensive testing strategy . ” At the White House , NNP Donald NNP VBD Bright looked IN an “ angry , disgruntled employee , ” and Bright ’s boss , HHS Secretary Alex Azar , VBD , “ Everything he is complaining about was achieved . ” “ So this is IN somebody who was in a choir and is now trying to say he was a soloist RB then , ” Azar added . NNP , VBD later , at a Pennsylvania medical equipment distributor , that the U.S. is ramping up production of NN - CD - related items and that his goal “ is to produce everything America needs for ourselves and then export to the NN , including medicines . ” Bright spoke in measured tones and rarely raised his voice during five hours of questioning . He did n’t question the fact that there ’s now an all - out effort , financed by billions in taxpayer dollars , to procure masks and other supplies , develop better tests and treatments and discover an effective NN . His point was that those efforts are n’t being fitted together in a coherent strategy that will VB supplies and medicines to where they ’re most needed to protect NNS and prevent shortages and price gouging . Asked by Rep. Joe Kennedy , D - Mass. , if administration officials have prepared the country for the “ moment we are in ” and the months ahead , Bright responded , “ I VBP we have a lot of work to do to be prepared . ” Rep. Frank Pallone , D - N.J. , asked if he should be concerned that Americans will have problems getting access to a NN when it ’s available . Bright responded , “ Absolutely , sir . ” Bright , a career official , alleges he was removed as head of the Biomedical Advanced NNP and Development Authority after repeatedly warning higher - ups the NN outbreak was VBG to be worse than the public was being led to VB . He VBD the breaking point came when he opposed a White House directive to allow widespread access to hydroxychloroquine , a malaria drug NNP was touting as an effective NN . The FDA recently warned against its use for NNP - CD , except in limited circumstances . But at the White House on Thursday , the NN was still bullish . “ We ’ve had tremendous response to the hydroxy , ” NNP VBD . “ So , a lot of NNS have sworn by it , and we ’ll VB . ” Republican lawmakers for the most part were careful not to attack Bright directly . But Rep. text: It is an everyday miracle , mysterious and beguiling , and it is replicated several thousand times over , at all hours , in churches that are beautiful and churches that are not . The priest consecrates the bread , and then he consecrates the wine , and there on the altar the meal becomes the NN and NN of Christ . Then , just as Jesus broke bread and shared wine with the apostles at the Last Supper , believers rise from the pews , receive the host , eat it , and , CD by CD , drink the Precious NNP , putting their lips to the same cup . That last part does n’t happen these days . Churches are closed and services have been moved online , for CD , but the Centers for NNP NNP and Prevention has RB advised against it . Before the NN , William Ouweleen had drunk from such a cup countless times . A vintner in the Finger Lakes region of NNP York , he used to attend mass and receive communion at St. Matthew Church , in Livonia , where the Precious NNP in the chalice had been a blush - colored wine that he ’d made . Ouweleen runs a winery named O - Neh - Da , which makes sacramental wine that churches use to celebrate the Eucharist . The winery , which is next to Hemlock Lake — “ o - neh - da ” is the Seneca word for “ hemlock ” — is the NN - to for Catholics in the Northeast . When Pope Francis visited NNP York City , in 2015 , he used O - Neh - Da wine for a mass at Madison Square Garden . In contrast to regular wine , which might be made with extra yeast , tannin powders , and flavorings , Communion wine must be “ natural , from the fruit of the grape , pure and incorrupt , not mixed with other substances , ” according to Vatican instructions . So , last fall , Ouweleen , a self - described “ hippie ” who is fifty - eight and wears his hair in dreadlocks , did what he does every fall : he harvested forty acres ’ worth of grapes , trucked them to his winery , crushed them , and allowed them to ferment with no additives . ( Except , that is , for some added sulfites , just before bottling — a preservative sanctioned by the Vatican . ) By springtime , he had fifty thousand gallons of wine in his cellar . This NN of NN , he MD usually be filling fifteen hundred wine bottles per day , in order to deliver them to churches in NNP York and Pennsylvania , and to religious - goods stores as far away as Florida and Guam . But he is n’t doing that this NN , because it MD mean purchasing glass bottles to fill with wine that might not sell . Ouweleen does n’t VB when the churches will reopen . This past Friday , NNP NNP deemed houses of worship “ essential ” and asked all governors to allow them “ to open RB now , for this weekend , ” but , in NNP York , houses of worship can only fully reopen in the last phase of the NN ’s four - part reopening plan , along with stadiums and amusement parks . Ouweleen is RB not sure that , when they do reopen , they will continue to serve consecrated wine , which , in most of the country ’s Catholic churches , is drunk from a chalice that is shared by the entire congregation . So he decided to ask them . Last month , Ouweleen typed up a letter to the bishop in Albany , to ask if he had any foresight on the future of sacramental wine . A week later , still awaiting a reply , Ouweleen broadened his query , writing to more than a thousand parishes — all customers of his — to ask if they plan to distribute the Eucharist by chalice , once church services resume . In his letter to the priests , Ouweleen explained that O - Neh - Da had survived — by NNP ’s grace — several wars , the Great Depression , and Prohibition , but , “ the Good Lord helps those who VBP themselves , so we are taking an active role in planning for the other side of this NN . ” Ouweleen figured that the wine in his cellar MD last for about a NN before its taste started to fade . “ I ’ll VB what to do with that wine when I VBP what to do , ” he VBD . “ This graceful hand of the unseen has been very present in my NN , and I respect that . ” In the meantime , he continued checking in on his vineyard . By September , his vines will have produced CD hundred tons of grapes , which will yield another forty thousand gallons of wine . It was getting warm , and the vines were about to bud . There are three major sacramental wineries in the NNP NNPS : Mont La Salle and Cribari , both in California , and O - Neh - Da , in NNP York , which is the smallest and the oldest . Established in 1872 by Bishop Bernard McQuaid , the JJ bishop of Rochester , O - Neh - Da was originally run by seminarians , and , later , by monks . In 2002 , it was purchased by Steven Goldstone , who ’d recently retired as the C.E.O. of RJR Nabisco , the food and tobacco conglomerate , and who ’d seen a notice in the Wall Street Journal advertising a winery for sale in the Finger Lakes . ( Goldstone , a private pilot , liked to fly over the region in his plane . ) In 2007 , there was another ad — this NN , in the PennySaver , for a rental house on the O - Neh - Da Winery ’s property , which MD cost eight hundred and fifty dollars a month . Ouweleen responded to it ; he and his wife , Lisa Woodhams , and his stepson , Jacob , were facing eviction from their home in Conesus . The family was continuously hard up — Ouweleen was the manager of an organic market that was trying ( and failing ) to compete with Wegmans — and they were searching for a gentler , more Christ - IN NN . text: In December , 1962 , Esquire magazine established what it called its Dubious Achievement Awards . These were a series of fictional prizes given to celebrities , politicians , and business leaders who committed some egregious blunder that NN , a gaffe worthy of a kind of Hall of Shame . The annual event became so popular that readers and NNS hungered for it NN after NN . Now there are dubious awards everywhere , across all genres — movies , television , commercials . Every NN organization hungers to win awards . They display them in glass NNS in the lobby . They write stories about the individual winners . Your public broadcaster is no different . We love getting awards . The award season is about to begin , with various programs submitting entries to award - conferring bodies . Over the NNS , the CBC — radio and television — has received hundreds of plaques , statuettes , proclamations recognizing significant achievements in reporting and broadcasting . At the tail end of 2016 , we received an official looking envelope containing an official , suitable - for - framing , award certificate . Because of its importance , I VBP to read the official proclamation word for word : To wit - " The 2016 Adding Insult to Injury Award , recognizing deception , distortion and dishonesty in NN , awarded to CBC Radio — The Sunday Edition . " The award was presented by the Board of Directors of NNP Choice Canada . For those unaware of NNP Choice Canada , it is an organization opposed to the compulsory NN of NNS . Its argument is that ordinary vaccinations can neurologically wound NNS or kill them outright . It blames NN for seeming increases in NN spectrum disorder . It assiduously ignores the burden of evidence from the NNP NNP Organization at the top of the NN chain , down to your local family physician and pharmacist , that this is not the case . NN is CD of the most contagious and deadly diseases on the planet . It kills about 100,000 NNS every NN . What NN Choice Canada objects to is a NN we broadcast on last June on the backfire effect . I interviewed an American professor named Brendan Nyhan . He explained the backfire effect as the inability of JJ NNS to VB their opinions , RB after presented with irrefutable facts to the contrary . It matters not how JJ facts are marshalled to contradict them . They are resolute , RB reinforced , in their views . During the interview , Professor Nyhan used the anti-vaccine movement as another example of the intransigence of NNS holding views which are contradicted by evidence . With the anti-vaccine movement , it is especially difficult . As the NNP York Times pointed out in early January , the anti-vaccine group " is not a bastion of rationality . " Although NN after NN has demonstrated there is no link between NN and such diseases as NN , the anti-vaxxers continue their crusade . You have to be an automaton not to feel sorry for parents dealing with NN , who search for some explanation for their NN 's disorder . In desperation they turn to garbage NN and NN theories . The American Academy of Pediatrics has issued a 21 page document listing all the studies showing that there is no link between NNS and NN . Nevertheless , the arguments put out by the anti-vaxxers seems to be gaining ground in the NNP NNP , especially in the south and especially in Texas . Peter Hotez is a pediatrician with the Baylor College of Medicine in Texas . Dr. Hotez , writing in the NNP York Times , VBD that because the number of unvaccinated NNS is rising , there MD be serious outbreaks of NNS in his NN . It does n't VB things when the sitting NN believes that NNS VBP NN . Dr. Hotez VBD : " I 'm worried that our nation 's NN will soon be threatened because we have not stood up to the pseudoscience and JJ NN claims of this movement . " In 2000 , the US Centres for NNP NNP announced that NNS had been eliminated in the NNP NNPS , meaning it was no longer endemic to the US . Now it appears to be coming RB . Which means a renewed attention on the importance of NN and the skeptics who oppose it . So on behalf of The Sunday Edition , I humbly accept the 2016 Adding Insult to Injury Award , and give it pride of place in our office . Click the button above to hear Michael 's essay .

text: Well , it gets very technical , and I do n’t VB to VB into the technicalities of this . But basically , these were futures contracts that rolled over . And so this was a phenomena that occurred over a 12 to 24 - hour period . So there ’s something a bit artificial about it . But it does reflect something that ’s real . Nobody wants the oil . It is not a precious commodity RB now because NNS are not driving , NNS are not flying , cruise ships are not cruising , and industry is not burning as much fuel as it was . And yet the NN is still producing this oil . That ’s JJ . So all of those things were done . But all that was accomplished , and it was something , was to stem the bleeding . And that brings us to the second trauma , which is the early NNS of the current century . When suddenly , our production is in decline again . China is growing by leaps and bounds . India is starting to grow by leaps and bounds . A middle class is growing around the developing NN . So demand is VBG up , UH , 5 million barrels a day around the NN . And the Middle East is suddenly more unstable . And so prices skyrocket between the NNS of about 2004 and 2007 . Economically speaking , no question about it . By 2014 , we were bringing down gasoline prices for consumers . It was part of our recovery from the recession . And all of this American production puts the NNP NNPS in a extremely powerful position economically , employing millions of NNS and producing revenues for NN and local governments across much of the country . RB giving the NNP NNPS the freedom to act in foreign policy in ways that MD have been unheard - of NNS before , such as putting pressure on Iran without endangering our NN supply . It was basically the culmination of the dream from the 1970s . And it was hard to imagine , just a few months ago , what MD happen that MD undercut that dream . So the oil has no place to VB . And it ’s rapidly filling up tank farms , strategic reserves around the NN . Refineries are running out of NN to put the oil . And so the inventories are building to a point where there ’ll be no physical NN to put the oil . You now have tankers which , you VBP , used to ship oil from place to place , just storing the oil and sitting out off of the shores of Los Angeles , for instance , and other places . And these are the NNS who are making a lot of money . They ’re getting paid to just hold the oil . Well , that ’s beginning to happen , but it ’s a cumbersome , complex process . RB of all , you have thousands of producers in the NNP NNPS . We do n’t have a national oil NN which is taking orders from the NN , such as in Saudi Arabia . And then there are complications that VBP along with shutting in wells . It ’s an expensive process . You can actually damage the resource to the point where , when you restart the oil , you ’ll actually pump less oil out . And then , you have all of these NNS that , RB when they ’re losing money , they need cash flow . They need cash flow to meet their payroll , to meet their debt responsibilities . text: Humans are hard - wired to avoid uncertainty . But when it comes to the NN crisis , uncertainty is unavoidable . Every day , we ’re bombarded with ambiguous , complex , and often conflicting NN . To make sense out of all this noise , the authors describe a framework for understanding different types of informational uncertainty . They then suggest several strategies for coping with that uncertainty , both cognitively ( to more effectively process and make sense of NN ) and emotionally ( to mitigate the stress and anxiety that result from uncertainty ) . Will colleges and universities restart in - person classes this fall ? Will there be a NN for the novel NN soon ? Will there be second wave of the NN ? Do I wear a mask outside RB if I plan to socially distance ? How can I figure out which NN sources and leaders to trust ? Every day we are faced with a torrent of NN from NN articles , cable networks , JJ NN , the White House , the Center for NNP NNP – and yet , there are no clear answers . As humans , we innately find uncertainty to be an aversive NN and are motivated to reduce it , RB at a cost . NN has shown that NNS are calmer and less agitated when they VBP they are VBG to receive an electric shock than when they VBP there is a 50 % chance they might receive an electric shock . Similarly , the threat of perceived job insecurity has more detrimental NN effects than actually losing a job . Feeling uncertain is not a natural NN of being for us — it signals to the brain that things are not JJ . The brain then seeks out NN to resolve the uncertainty . This desire for resolution is why feelings of uncertainty lead us to process NN more systematically and deeply in the hope of finding answers . But the NN NN leaves us in a quandary : Our natural instinct is to try to resolve our intense feelings of uncertainty , but there is so much uncertainty around the NN and its effects that a quest for complete resolution is futile . So what can we do ? RB , it is important to understand that uncertainty is multi-dimensional . There are at least three types of uncertainty : probability , ambiguity , and complexity . To cope with each , we have identified several strategies , both cognitive ( to more effectively process and make sense of NN ) and emotional ( to mitigate the stress and anxiety that result from uncertainty ) . Probability uncertainty refers to situations in which it is difficult to ascertain NN levels : Not only do you not VB what will happen , you RB do n’t VB how likely each outcome is . For example , how much am I really at NN compared to others in my group ? NNS of my age ? NNS where I live ? NNS who behave IN me ? As a cognitive coping mechanism , the JJ thing to do is to understand that you are at NN as much as any other member of your group . NN shows that NNS tend to underestimate their own NN of contracting a NN or encountering a negative event . This is a self - positivity bias , that needs to be overcome . Recognize that you are as much at NN as everyone else , and focus on what you VBP you can do to reduce NN by complying with expert recommendations ( e.g. , wash hands often , wear facial coverings in public , maintain JJ distancing ) . Do n’t be that person who gets yelled at in a grocery store for not wearing a mask ! Emotionally , it is important to embrace that you are at as much NN as the NNS around you and empathize with them on this common ground . Connect virtually ( or in person with appropriate JJ distance , if allowed ) with NNS you care about , whether they are friends , family or neighbors . Accept that we ’re all in the same boat and we ’re all doing our best to VB through this together . Ambiguity uncertainty refers to situations in which we are faced with imprecise , insufficient , or conflicting NN . For example , we were VBN that the NN MD be transmitted through hard surfaces such as cardboard , plastic , metal , etc . Now the CDC believes that the NN is mostly airborne and that the chances of contracting the NN through surfaces is very small . What does that mean for my behavior ? Can I VB the NN from not just someone ’s cough , but if they speak to me ? Is six NNS of JJ distancing enough to protect myself ? As a cognitive coping mechanism , consolidate the different sources of NN and try to VB clarity through what JJ NNS call triangulation ( i.e. , using multiple measures or methods to ensure that they all converge on the same result ) . Rely most on NN that is reported consistently through multiple reliable sources . But RB understand that the NN is novel , and that the NN around it keeps evolving . So sometimes we need to find a non-cognitive approach that does not involve trying to resolve uncertainty . Cope emotionally by knowing when it ’s NN to end the search for more NN . Sources such as the CDC warn against NN overload : “ Take breaks from watching , reading , or listening to NN stories , including JJ NN . Hearing about the NN repeatedly can be upsetting . ” Recognize that the endless search for clarity can create more stress than it alleviates , and sometimes enough is enough . This occurs when an issue is technically complex and difficult to understand : For example , for non-statisticians , it can be hard to understand what “ flattening the curve ” really means , why it ’s important , and how to balance different factors such as resource constraints , geographical variances , and JJ considerations . Is it true that a week ’s delay in lockdown in March led to a loss of 36,000 lives ? And now , how is each NN or county making the decision to reopen , and how are they balancing JJ loss against the loss of JJ NN ? As a cognitive coping mechanism , consult an expert source well versed in the field to break down complex NN into understandable nuggets . Make sure to find sources grounded in NN , not partisanship . And again , recognize when the quest for NN is helpful , and when it is n’t . Maybe what ’s needed RB now is not to understand the details of each epidemiological model , but instead to just understand what actions we need to take to be safe . Simplify the complexity into an actionable piece of NN ( e.g. , wear a mask when VBG outside ) . If this gets too overwhelming , cope emotionally by finding ways to escape the complexity : Re-watch a favorite TV show , knit a blanket , or organize your closet by color . Or if you can , escape your own stresses by making this NN a little less stressful for others : Donate to your local food bank , support your local businesses , or RB bail someone out of jail . Taking these steps to mitigate informational uncertainty will leave you with the mental bandwidth to cope with the JJ other important issues we all face . And in these trying times , it ’s best to take every chance you VBP to unwind and find some moments of zen .
